citations.narrative:
Item Primary Enclosures 3.80 a 1
At the time of inspection, testing chairs used for primates had an area of worn tape on the internal surface of the
face mask which comes in contact with the primates, in addition the face mask needed to be cleaned due to an
accumulation of debris.
Facility need to insure testing chairs are properly cleaned and maintained for the safety of the primates.
Correct by 8/8/14
Exit interview conducted at the end of inspection

narrative:

PRIMARY ENCLOSURES.

At the time of inspection, testing chairs used for primates had an area of worn tape on the internal surface of  the
face mask which comes in contact with the primates, in addition the face mask needed to be cleaned due to an
accumulation of debris.
